extendedIngredients.aisle: Nut butters, Jams, and Honey;Health Foods
extendedIngredients.name: honey
soy chunks
extendedIngredients.originalString: 1 cup Enjoy Life Mega Chunks (or other chocolate)

recipes.title: Triple Layer Cookie Bars with Chocolate Caramel Topping
recipes.instructions: Preheat oven to 350.Combine all cookie ingredients except chocolate chunks until dough forms and all ingredients are well combined.Stir in chocolate chunks.Divide dough in half.Press half of dough evenly into the bottom of a breadpan greased with coconut oil.Make chocolate topping by melting 1 cup chocolate chunks in microwave.Pour 3/4 of topping evenly over dough and place in freezer to let set (about 15 or so minutes).While chocolate is setting, make the caramel topping by bringing honey to a boil over medium heat, then turning down to medium-low and continuing to sizzle for 5-7 minutes, stirring occassionaly.After 5-7 minutes, remove from heat and add palm shortening, coconut milk, and salt.Return to heat for 15 minutes, stirring occasionally.Remove from heat and set aside.Remove bars from freezer and press remaining half of dough evenly over chocolate layer.Bake for 12-15 minutes, or until top layer edges begin to brown.Remove from oven and allow to cool completely in pan, then cool in refrigerator until the chocolate layer is set.Once cool, reheat caramel sauce and remaining chocolate sauce and drizzle over top.Nom your face off.

steps.step: Combine all cookie ingredients except chocolate chunks until dough forms and all ingredients are well combined.Stir in chocolate chunks.Divide dough in half.Press half of dough evenly into the bottom of a breadpan greased with coconut oil.Make chocolate topping by melting 1 cup chocolate chunks in microwave.

Pour 3/4 of topping evenly over dough and place in freezer to let set (about 15 or so minutes).While chocolate is setting, make the caramel topping by bringing honey to a boil over medium heat, then turning down to medium-low and continuing to sizzle for 5-7 minutes, stirring occassionaly.After 5-7 minutes, remove from heat and add palm shortening, coconut milk, and salt.Return to heat for 15 minutes, stirring occasionally.
Remove from heat and set aside.
Remove bars from freezer and press remaining half of dough evenly over chocolate layer.
Bake for 12-15 minutes, or until top layer edges begin to brown.

Remove from oven and allow to cool completely in pan, then cool in refrigerator until the chocolate layer is set.Once cool, reheat caramel sauce and remaining chocolate sauce and drizzle over top.Nom your face off.
